payload.name: convex-optimization
payload.title: Convex optimization: global guarantees under constraints
payload.formal: many allocation problems can be posed as convex programs with reliable solvers.
payload.apm2_mapping: scheduling, budgeting, placement, and admission are optimization problems under constraints (SLOs, risk tiers, failure domains). Start with convex relaxations; only go heuristic when necessary. The key is that convex programs produce *auditable* decisions and sensitivities.
